preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 8 g of P (Phosphorus) using an analytical balance. 
 2. Weigh out 16 g of Sc (Scandium) using the same balance. 
 3. Weigh out 8 g of Zr (Zirconium). 
 4. In a clean, dry container, combine the weighed ingredients thoroughly using a spatula to ensure an even mixture.
